channel.title: Four Corners on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Four Corners on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-491 South at US-160
item.description: US-491 south at US-160. Turn left for US-160 east to Durango. Continue ahead for US-160 West/US-491 South. Use US-160 west for Four Corners; use US-491 south for Shiprock, New Mexico. US-160 west joins US-491 southbound to the Four Corners area.

item.title: NM-597 - Four Corners
item.description: NM-597 just north of US-160. NM-597 is a short state route connecting US-160 with the Four Corners monument.

item.title: NM-597 - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico on NM-597, at US-160.

item.title: US-160 East at NM-597
item.description: US-160 east approaching NM-597 at Four Corners.
